features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: As reported in 38 AVADA reviews. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: As reported in 38 AVADA reviews. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product. 29 reviewers of AVADA have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 41 AVADA reviews. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action. 32 reviewers of AVADA have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 30 AVADA reviews. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Based on 30 AVADA reviews. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Based on 25 AVADA reviews. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 42 AVADA reviews. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application. 26 reviewers of AVADA have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically This feature was mentioned in 52 AVADA reviews.

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: As reported in 48 AVADA reviews. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring. This feature was mentioned in 47 AVADA reviews.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 49 AVADA reviews. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: As reported in 46 AVADA reviews. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects. This feature was mentioned in 47 AVADA reviews.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: As reported in 36 AVADA reviews. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages. This feature was mentioned in 59 AVADA reviews.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Based on 49 AVADA reviews. Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: As reported in 42 AVADA reviews. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database. This feature was mentioned in 42 AVADA reviews.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information. This feature was mentioned in 42 AVADA reviews.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization. This feature was mentioned in 37 AVADA reviews.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps. 37 reviewers of AVADA have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 42 AVADA reviews. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 45 AVADA reviews. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system. This feature was mentioned in 34 AVADA reviews.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: As reported in 48 AVADA reviews. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar. 40 reviewers of AVADA have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR. This feature was mentioned in 40 AVADA reviews.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Based on 41 AVADA reviews. Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores. 39 reviewers of AVADA have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions. 41 reviewers of AVADA have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: As reported in 42 AVADA reviews. Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails. 41 reviewers of AVADA have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Based on 40 AVADA reviews. Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 51 AVADA reviews. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity. 53 reviewers of AVADA have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 42 AVADA reviews. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Based on 44 AVADA reviews. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors. 57 reviewers of AVADA have provided feedback on this feature.

initial_reviews.review_title: Avada is a great introduction to digital marketing
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AVADA?
Avada is inexpensive compared to the cost of a marketing agency to take care of your website design, especially if they don't have the knowledge of your employees. It's definitely a worthwhile investment. Avada connects to a CRM like Salesforce.com so you can monitor leads and increase the number of customers you have. One of the biggest problems companies face is not knowing where their leads are coming from, thanks to Avada, you can target your marketing campaigns effectively. One of my favorite tools is Social Inbox, which is a Twitter feature. With the Avada application, you can monitor all social networks and evaluate the effectiveness and spread of each post. It also simplifies the procedure so that you can plan posts on multiple social networks from one place.

What do you dislike about AVADA?
Start-up costs are high for small businesses. Call to action buttons are too simple and should have more alternatives so they don't look the same throughout the site. I think websites using Avada would lack freshness and professionalism if they had more options for graphic design, fonts and layouts. Any company that takes care of itself wants everything it does to look as professional as possible.

What problems is AVADA solving and how is that benefiting you?
I give Avada a 10 because of its immense size. An item that is new, simple and helps create new business, is efficient and saves time is approved by two. In addition to the fact that they are of great quality, they also have a customer service that is willing to help you with any problems you present. I consider Avada to be vitally important for any business. They give you the tools you need to succeed and prove their effectiveness. If you don't have the Avada application, you are missing out on a great opportunity!

all_reviews.review_title: Avada is a great introduction to digital marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AVADA?
Avada is inexpensive compared to the cost of a marketing agency to take care of your website design, especially if they don't have the knowledge of your employees. It's definitely a worthwhile investment. Avada connects to a CRM like Salesforce.com so you can monitor leads and increase the number of customers you have. One of the biggest problems companies face is not knowing where their leads are coming from, thanks to Avada, you can target your marketing campaigns effectively. One of my favorite tools is Social Inbox, which is a Twitter feature. With the Avada application, you can monitor all social networks and evaluate the effectiveness and spread of each post. It also simplifies the procedure so that you can plan posts on multiple social networks from one place.

What do you dislike about AVADA?
Start-up costs are high for small businesses. Call to action buttons are too simple and should have more alternatives so they don't look the same throughout the site. I think websites using Avada would lack freshness and professionalism if they had more options for graphic design, fonts and layouts. Any company that takes care of itself wants everything it does to look as professional as possible.

What problems is AVADA solving and how is that benefiting you?
I give Avada a 10 because of its immense size. An item that is new, simple and helps create new business, is efficient and saves time is approved by two. In addition to the fact that they are of great quality, they also have a customer service that is willing to help you with any problems you present. I consider Avada to be vitally important for any business. They give you the tools you need to succeed and prove their effectiveness. If you don't have the Avada application, you are missing out on a great opportunity!

I had to reach out to customer support regarding duplicated widget showing on my account with another widget I had in place.

I opened the chat box and within 5 minutes a customer representative responded. Her name is Jasmine and she efficiently solved my problem in less than 10 minutes. I was surprised that the developer of the app (Marcus) was able to customize the widget location for me. This customer service is beyond my expectation and I truly am delighted with this app, it makes my new store look more professional. Highly recommend 10/10.

all_reviews.review_title: Nice marketing automation workflow, all essential features and no-cost version
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AVADA?
For someone just starting with marketing automation, Avada would work great. It has all essential features, the basics for email automation, worklows,you can have as may as 5K contacts, and all this comes in a free version that you can very much use to figure out how to adjust your marketing automation efforts. Customizing the emails is easy, working with the workflows is also simple, you can figure those out even without having any prior experience.

What do you dislike about AVADA?
Bigger variety of email templates for the free version would be nice, but even the ones currently available can do the job.

What problems is AVADA solving and how is that benefiting you?
Avada helps the team set up an initial marketing automation campaign to identify what works and what not, with zero cost. It is difficult to commit to a specific marketing software before verifying how it works and whether it would work for your customers so Avada makes a risk-free initial marketing automation setup quick and easy.

all_reviews.review_title: Best Email Marketing App for Shopify Stores
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AVADA?
AVADA Email Marketing is really easy to use and the customer support is absolutely the best you can find. Jasmine was really helpful and managed well all my problems.
They work great also with shopify forms and they have a good filtering for audience. After that also the automations and campaigns template are really beautiful and easy to set up.

What do you dislike about AVADA?
Only one little thing, but actually they are working on it, so I think we will have it in some days from now because they truly listen to their customers:
They do not have "Customer.Locale Property" to correctly filter customers based on their language. Now I am auto-tagging customers using a script in my shopify forms, however it would be better to have that filter integrated, I am sure they will release it in some days from now.

What problems is AVADA solving and how is that benefiting you?
I can easily set up automations, campaigns with great design and simplicity. Audience management is great and filters are awesome too. They defintely also have lots of integrations with other apps, for example Judge.me. They are complete and they have the best customer support.

review_question_answers.answer:
AVADA Email Marketing is really easy to use and the customer support is absolutely the best you can find. Jasmine was really helpful and managed well all my problems.
They work great also with shopify forms and they have a good filtering for audience. After that also the automations and campaigns template are really beautiful and easy to set up.
